Game.Notes: Mega Games 3 is a compilation released for the Sega Mega Drive only in Europe in 1993. It was the last of three similar compilations, and was only distributed with Sega Mega Drive II consoles. Mega Games 3 contains 3 games: Alien Storm, Super Thunder Blade and Super Monaco.
